Loxo is the next generation hiring platform.

Executive search firms, staffing agencies, and other recruiting teams use Loxo to find the right talent, anywhere in the world. We are working on becoming a data-first recruiting platform by using machine intelligence to help empower recruiters to sift through millions of candidates (Loxo AI) with the most up to date information (Loxo Connect).

If helping people reach their fullest potential by empowering recruiters to look through the true pool of talent interests you, please email sebastian@loxo.co
